name: Gerry Themes Pro
description:
Gerry Themes Pro is a refined themes collection designed for comfortable development experience, including 30 themes (22 pro themes) with cost-effective price.

Features:
 ★Well balanced colors
★Better syntax highlight
★Unified themes style
★Button component outline
★Work and adapt with new UI

Pro Features:
 ★Great value:
Get 6 standalone paid plugins themes and all contrast themes for the price less than 2.
License contains perpetual fallback license.
★Customized experience:
Switch between general themes and contrast themes / high contrast themes.
★Exclusive themes:
Get 2 exclusive high contrast themes and 2 exclusive light themes in Gerry Themes Pro.

Theme list(30):
 General themes(10):
⚫Gerry Violet(Gerry Purple)
⚫Gerry Oceanic
⚫Gerry Storm
⚫Gerry Space(Pro)
⚫Gerry Nature(Pro)
⚫Gerry Coffee(Pro)
⚫Gerry Cherry(Pro)
⚫Gerry Darcula
⚫Gerry Dark
⚫Gerry Aurora(Pro)

Light themes(3):
⚫Gerry* Light
⚫Gerry* Sky(Pro)
⚫Gerry* Aqua(Pro)

Note: Contrast themes and high contrast themes color schema contains "red" for stronger syntax highlight.
Contrast themes(10):
⚫Gerry+ Space(Pro)
⚫Gerry+ Violet(Pro)
⚫Gerry+ Oceanic(Pro)
⚫Gerry+ Darcula(Pro)
⚫Gerry+ Dark(Pro)
⚫Gerry+ Nature(Pro)
⚫Gerry+ Cherry(Pro)
⚫Gerry+ Coffee(Pro)
⚫Gerry+ Storm(Pro)
⚫Gerry+ Aurora(Pro)

High contrast themes(3):
⚫Gerry++ Cyberpunk(Pro)
⚫Gerry++ Space×Cyberpunk(Pro)
⚫Gerry++ Aurora×Cyberpunk(Pro)

Legacy themes(4):
⚫Legacy Gerry Dark
⚫Legacy Gerry Darcula
⚫Legacy Gerry+ Dark(Pro)
⚫Legacy Gerry+ Darcula(Pro)

If you like this plugin, please consider giving me a five-star rating.
If you don't want to pay, you can try Gerry Themes(free and open source).

Standalone versions(included in Gerry Themes Pro):
Gerry Cyberpunk
Gerry Space
Gerry Nature
Gerry Cherry
Gerry Coffee
Gerry Aurora

The screenshots taken with new UI preview 2022.3(EAP). Gerry Themes Pro is actively updating to improve and suit for new UI.
Gerry Themes Pro won't relate font setting with themes, just feel free to use your favor font setting style.

Inspired by Atom One Dark and Material Theme UI Lite for JetBrains.

Getting started

If you have any questions about plugin or themes, please contact me by Issue tracker or Email.
Cover screenshot themes: Gerry Space×Cyberpunk, Gerry Sky
notes:
Improve: Redesign identifier under caret color.
Improve: Redesign matched brace color.
Improve: Redesign folded text background color.
Improve: Reduce parameter hint color brightness.
Improve: Redesigned accelerator foreground color.
Improve: Adjust second color for light themes.
Improve: Minor improvements.
Fix: Fix spinner color error which may cause some border invisible.
